price: [به آنان گفته می‌شود:] «امروز ناله و زاری نکنید [که] هرگز از سوی ما یاری نخواهید شد.
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
